alert.note: Alert for Davis (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 15 at 4:05PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Possible Winter Storm to Impact Southeast Iowa Tomorrow Evening into Thursday... .Wintry mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow expected across portions of southeast Iowa beginning tomorrow evening. Precipitation will transition to all snow overnight into Thursday morning and continuing to Thursday afternoon. Light glaze of ice is possible Wednesday evening followed with the potential of several inches of snow into the day Thursday. ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
